wikipedia_page.main: Alan Hargreaves (born 1931) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players (1–49 league appearances)

response: Players developed during his time at Crewe included internationals Stan Bowles and John Mahoney. Tagg is often quoted in respect of Bowles's gambling problems; he used to give Stan's wages direct to his wife, saying: "If he could pass a bookies as well as he passes a football, he'd be a very rich man." Tagg was also acknowledged by soccer coach Alan Hargreaves for giving him the opportunity to enter professional football.Acknowledgements (p.xi) in Hargreaves' book Skills and Strategies for Coaching Soccer (1990)
